definition: see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

sentences.english: Damn, I am good at telling lies!
sentences.chinese: 媽的，我只是撒謊不打草稿。

sentences.english: It's stopped looking like a rabbit. It's just a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 媽的，它看起來已經不象一隻野兔了，只是一朵雲。

sentences.english: It is the League Cup. Bloody hell, what next?
sentences.chinese: 這可是聯賽盃，媽的，誰知道接下來會是什麼？

sentences.english: Damn, even the Canadians are rolling over to the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 媽的，連加拿大人都轉到中國人那去了。

definition: Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
to infuriate/to be furious/to die from an excess of anger
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
